content.raw:
An interesting artifact of normalizing the pixel colors based on the current min and max temperatures is that one object's temperature may change even the ambient.

I think the root of the problem is in `ign-sensors`: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/100/citadel-add-thermal-camera-sensor/diff#Lsrc/ThermalCameraSensor.ccT506
